00028 #include "qf_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"
00030 
00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qf_act)
00032 
00033 
00040 /* public objects ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 QActive *QF_active_[QF_MAX_ACTIVE + 1];      /* to be used by QF ports only */
00042 uint8_t QF_intLockNest_;                    /* interrupt-lock nesting level */
00043 
00044 /*..........................................................................*/
00045 /*lint -e970 -e971            ignore MISRA rules 13 and 14 in this function */
00046 char const Q_ROM * Q_ROM_VAR QF_getVersion(void) {
00047     static char const Q_ROM Q_ROM_VAR version[] = {
00048         ((QP_VERSION >> 12) & 0xF) + '0',
00049         '.',
00050         ((QP_VERSION >>  8) & 0xF) + '0',
00051         '.',
00052         ((QP_VERSION >>  4) & 0xF) + '0',
00053         (QP_VERSION         & 0xF) + '0',
00054         '\0'
00055     };
00056     return version;
00057 }
00058 /*..........................................................................*/
00059 void QF_add_(QActive *a) {
00060     uint8_t p = a->prio;
00061     QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00062 
00063     Q_REQUIRE(((uint8_t)0 < p) && (p <= (uint8_t)QF_MAX_ACTIVE)
00064               && (QF_active_[p] == (QActive *)0));
00065 
00066     QF_INT_LOCK_();
00067 
00068     QF_active_[p] = a;      /* registger the active object at this priority */
00069 
00070     QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_ACTIVE_ADD, QS_aoObj_, a)
00071         QS_TIME_();                                            /* timestamp */
00072         QS_OBJ_(a);                                    /* the active object */
00073         QS_U8_(p);                     /* the priority of the active object */
00074     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00075 
00076     QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00077 }
00078 /*..........................................................................*/
00079 void QF_remove_(QActive const *a) {
00080     uint8_t p = a->prio;
00081     QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00082 
00083     Q_REQUIRE(((uint8_t)0 < p) && (p <= (uint8_t)QF_MAX_ACTIVE)
00084               && (QF_active_[p] == a));
00085 
00086     QF_INT_LOCK_();
00087 
00088     QF_active_[p] = (QActive *)0;             /* free-up the priority level */
00089 
00090     QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_ACTIVE_REMOVE, QS_aoObj_, a)
00091         QS_TIME_();                                            /* timestamp */
00092         QS_OBJ_(a);                                    /* the active object */
00093         QS_U8_(p);                     /* the priority of the active object */
00094     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00095 
00096     QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00097 }
